casebody.data:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1779. R2H, L.L.C. v. E-POCH Properties, L.L.C.

Cuyahoga App. No. 95496. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution and motion to compel discovery,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
